>>23860666
I am HODLing small amounts of each. I won't go into too much detail (or shill too hard!) as each teams website, and reports you can read from Nik Patel, Blockfyre, etc. go into detail on them.

OCEAN has the partnerships and is moving rapidly (although there has been some kinks with for e.g. their data market place launch).

UBT is integral to Baseline Protocol - and I think we'll see an increase in enterprise adoption of blockchain into 2021.

COTI is my low cap play. Their marketcap is about $20m but their merchant turnover this month alone is $12m. They've recently produced a Crypto Volatility index called CVX which is interesting. It seems to be going somewhat under the radar that this is being airdropped to holders currently on a weekly basis.
